item.title: Four charged with carjacking at gunpoint in Manatee County
item.description: The Manatee County Sheriff’s Office announced the arrest of four people after allegedly stealing a man’s car using his own gun after a trip to the beach on July 8.

item.title: The 2025 summer sports camp is underway at The Out-of-Door Academy
item.description: Kids from all over the Suncoast community participating in some of their favorite sports, enjoying frozen treats and making new friends.

item.title: Democrats sue over access to Everglades detention center
item.description: Florida law allows legislators “at their pleasure” to visit state correctional institutions.

item.title: North Port home prices see biggest drop in the country
item.description: Prices are falling fast in North Port, with prices dropping over 10% from April 2024 to April 2025.

item.title: Fee waived adoptions at the Humane Society of Sarasota County
item.description: Fees will be waived for all dogs and adult cats.

item.title: First Alert Weather: Increasing moisture ups rain chances early next week
Water quality advisory for North Lido Beach lifted
item.description: There is an increased risk of illness to swimmers, local health officials said.
